original_text: The leaders and the people answered King Ahab, ‘Do not listen to that man. Do not agree to do what he is asking for.’
korean_text: 모든 장로와 백성들이 다 왕께 아뢰되 왕은 듣지도 말고 허락하지도 마옵소서 한지라

sentences.original_text: The leaders and the people answered King Ahab
Do not listen to that man
Do not agree to do what he is asking for
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 요청하는 것을 동의해서 하지 마소서
